--------------------
Text: Almost Sunrise is a 2016 American documentary film directed by Michael Collins.
Triplets:<Almost Sunrise
1:
--------------------
Text: Almost Sunrise:  It recounts the story of two Iraq veterans, Tom Voss and Anthony Anderson, who, in an attempt to put their combat experience behind them, embark on a 2,700-mile trek on foot across America.

Triplets:<Almost Sunrise
2:
<Text: Almost Sunrise:  It made its world premiere on the opening night of the Telluride Mountainfilm Festival on 27 May, 2016.>
Triplets:<Almost Sunrise
